message.subject: UG315
message.content:
M1.1. Please send the current DRAFT to the User's Guide to 1999 ISDA Credit
Derivatives Definitions to my attention. [Y]
[Request-Action: send current draft of a user's guide to Sara's attention]
Flink1.1
M1.2. I understand that these can be sent
to reply mail.
[Inform: Sara has been informed that such drafts can be sent to reply mail]
M1.3. You can reach me by phone at 713/853-5620 if you have any
problems.
[Inform: Sara's phone number]
M1.4. Thanks.
[Conventional: thanks]
M1.5. Sara Shackleton [Enron North America Corp.]
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: UG315
message.content:
M2.1. Is it possible to obtain a copy of the draft "User's Guide to 1999 ISDA
Credit Derivatives Definitions" today?
[Request-Information: possible to obtain a copy of the draft today]
Flink2.1
M2.2. I would very much appreciate receipt
as soon as possible. [Y]
[Inform: Sara would like to receive it ASAP]
M2.3. Enron is a member of ISDA.
[Inform: Enron is a member of ISDA]
M2.4. Thanks again.
[Conventional: thanks]
M2.5. Sara
Shackleton
[Conventional: signature]
